DOC.brief_summary: To examine effect sleep impairment cop style patient diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Abstract Objective : To examine effect sleep impairment cop style patient diabetes Research Design Methods : A total 105 patient ( 40 male , 65 female ) diabetes mellitus recruited outpatient diabetic clinic 2011 February . All patient ask fill sociodemographic inquiry , Epworth Sleepiness Scale Coping Style Inventory .
DOC.criteria: Patients diabetes long 6 month Complications congestive heart failure , chronic renal failure
DOC.keyword: Sleep impairment , Coping Style , Diabetes Mellitus
